name: Boxy Boy :) - Brackeys Game Jam 2023.1
description:
Here's my game jam submission :)

It's really not much - mostly a really buggy concept at this point haha.  But I hope you at least enjoy some of the concepts behind it :)

Everything was made entirely by myself other than the music, which is authored by one known as "Joth" on opengameart.org.
